title: 128 - We're Gonna Buy The Declaration Of Independence
description: On today's show, the guys chat about some of the movies and shows they're getting caught up on, Mitt gives a detailed review of the new Tom & Jerry Movie and his thoughts on the newest Space Jam starring LeBron, they discuss China anally swabbing every person that wants to come to their country and whether or not that will hamper tourism, the guys discuss at length their interest in buying one of the 20 copies of The Declaration of Independence, they cover the rules of a drinking game that someone made for the show, Bill is a little ornery for whatever reason, they chat about the infamous Ludacris episode of Cribs, and Nick has a few new Friday Bangerz to help send you into the weekend. Don't forget to follow The Pod on Youtube, as there is now a new channel with all the videos, and send your submissions to the FOD @ThePodPMI on Twitter and Instagram. We appreciate you all for listening, see you on Wednesday.
dc:creator: The Pod
